Text: I'm downloading it because it was just mentioned on CSI :) Btw the sound is 3.3 seconds out of sync and IVTC is bad here and there. Not too bad, but I'll get the DVDR instead.

it didnt work for me, on neither PS3 Media Server nor did it work thru k-lite's bundled Media Player Classic. I will try and re-download, and then post back whether it worked tha 2nd time but i doubt it. tha sample worked fine, but tha main movie didnt.

tweakmode: You shouldn't have to redownload completely - if you just right-click the torrent in uTorrent, and stop it, then right-click and select re-check, it should determine if any parts are bad and re-download just those parts. Presumably similar options in other clients(?) Plus I've heard there's a codec or two(?) that won't play on the PS3 media server because it blocks the content due to copyright issues. Trust Sony to do something like that.

VicVega: if some say it's ok, and you have issues like the 3.3 seconds out of sync, you could just be having codec issues... try VLC or uninstall/reinstall certain codecs. (presumably whatever ones this movie is encoded in)
